name: Drizzile
description: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.

abilities.name: Shady Dealings
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may search your deck for a Trainer card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
